summary.span: 支持 控件并提供一个接口，使数据绑定控件可以对业务对象和数据对象执行数据操作。

span.span: Supports the control and provides an interface for data-bound controls to perform data operations with business and data objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类主要用于数据绑定控件，而不是页代码中的可编程对象。The class is intended primarily to be used by data-bound controls, and not as a programmable object in page code. 类实现 控件的数据功能，包括 、、和 操作、排序、筛选和管理保存在视图状态中的设置。The class implements the data functionality for the control, including the , , , and operations, sorting, filtering, and management of settings kept in view state. 在运行时为 类的每个实例创建一个 对象。A object is created for each instance of the class at run time. 对 类的实例的数据操作的调用由 对象的实例进行处理。Calls to data operations of the instance of the class are handled by the instance of the object. 页面开发人员不会直接访问 类的实例。Page developers do not access the instance of the class directly. 控件开发人员可以通过扩展 和 类来创建自定义数据控件。Control developers can create custom data controls by extending the and classes. 类通过使用反射对业务或数据对象调用方法来执行数据操作。The class performs data operations by calling methods on business or data objects using reflection. 在运行时， 控件创建一个类型的实例，该类型由 属性标识，然后为数据操作调用适当的方法。At run time, the control creates an instance of the type that is identified by the property, and then calls the appropriate method for the data operation. 不会将实例化对象缓存在内存中。The instantiated object is not cached in memory by the . 为每个数据方法调用创建并销毁对象。The object is created and destroyed for every data method call. 如果 `static` 方法（`Shared` Visual Basic），则不会创建实例，但仍会调用数据操作方法。If the method is `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic), an instance is not created but the data operation method is still called. 控件不会直接向页面开发人员公开 。The is not directly exposed to page developers by the control. 相反，可以通过 访问 的属性和方法。Instead, the properties and methods of the are accessed through the . 例如，通过设置 的 属性设置 属性的 。For example, the of property is set by setting the property of the . ## 检索数据Retrieving Data 数据源视图执行的最基本的操作是使用 方法从基础数据存储中检索数据，该方法检索数据项的 集合。The most basic operation that a data source view performs is data retrieval from the underlying data storage using the method, which retrieves an collection of data items. 以下数据检索方法、属性和事件由 对象实现，由其 控件直接向页面开发人员和其他调用方公开：The following data retrieval methods, properties, and events are implemented by the object and exposed directly by its control to page developers and other callers: - 方法The method - 属性The property - 属性The property - 事件The event - 事件The event ## 更新数据Updating Data 对象通过调用由 属性标识的业务或数据对象方法来支持数据更新。The object supports data updates by calling a business or data object method that is identified by the property. 自动执行更新的数据绑定控件（如 和 控件）会将其参数从 接口传递到 ，并且视图对象将这些参数与在 集合中找到的任何参数合并。Data-bound controls that automatically perform updates, such as the and controls, pass their parameters in an interface to the and the view object merges these parameters with any parameters that are found in the collection. 以下更新方法、属性和事件由 实现，由其 控件直接公开给页面开发人员和其他调用方：The following update methods, properties, and events are implemented by the and exposed directly by its control to page developers and other callers: - 方法The method - 属性The property - 属性The property - 事件The event - 事件The event ## 插入数据Inserting Data 对象支持通过调用 属性标识的业务或数据对象方法插入新的数据行。The object supports inserting new rows of data by calling a business or data object method that is identified by the property. 自动执行插入的数据绑定控件（如 和 ）将其在 接口中传递给 ，并且视图对象将这些参数与在 集合中找到的任何参数合并。Data-bound controls that automatically perform inserts, such as the and , pass their parameters in an interface to the and the view object merges these parameters with any parameters that are found in the collection. 以下插入方法、属性和事件由 实现，由其 控件直接公开给页面开发人员和其他调用方：The following insert methods, properties, and events are implemented by the and exposed directly by its control to page developers and other callers: - 方法The method - 属性The property - 属性The property - 事件The event - 事件The event ## 删除数据Deleting Data 对象支持通过调用 属性标识的业务或数据对象方法来删除数据。The object supports deleting data by calling a business or data object method that is identified by the property. 自动执行删除的数据绑定控件（如 和 ）将其在 接口中传递给 ，并且视图对象将这些参数与在 集合中找到的任何参数合并。Data-bound controls that automatically perform deletes, such as the and , pass their parameters in an interface to the and the view object merges these parameters with any parameters that are found in the collection. 以下 delete 方法、属性和事件由 实现，由其 控件直接公开给页面开发人员和其他调用方：The following delete methods, properties, and events are implemented by the and exposed directly by its control to page developers and other callers: - 方法The method - 属性The property - 属性The property - 事件The event - 事件The event ## 对数据进行筛选和排序Filtering and Sorting Data 当你可以动态筛选数据时，数据检索功能更强大。Data retrieval is more powerful when you can filter the data dynamically. 仅当 方法返回 或 对象时， 控件才支持筛选。Filtering is supported only by the control if the method returns a or object. 您可以使用 和 属性将动态筛选应用到数据检索。You can use the and properties to apply dynamic filtering to data retrieval. 这些属性由 对象实现，由其 控件直接向数据绑定控件和其他调用方公开。These properties are implemented by the object and exposed directly by its control to data-bound controls and other callers. 您可以使用 来对检索到的数据进行排序，方法是在检索后对内存中的数据进行排序。You can sort the data that you retrieve with the by ordering the data in memory after it is retrieved. 仅当 方法返回 或 时， 控件才支持排序。Sorting is supported only by the control if the method returns a or . 属性始终返回 `true`，因为 无法确定 方法返回的类型，而不会调用方法。The property always returns `true`, because the cannot determine what type is returned by the method without calling the method. 属性语法与 属性相同。The property syntax is the same as for a property. ## 跟踪视图状态Tracking View State 实现 接口，并使用视图状态在页请求之间跟踪其状态。The implements the interface and uses view state to track its state across page requests. 提供 、和 方法的实现，以便为控件启用视图状态跟踪。Implementation of the , , and methods are provided to enable view state tracking for the control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数由 方法调用，以使用指定的 `viewName` 参数返回数据源视图的新实例。The constructor is called by the method to return a new instance of a data source view with the specified `viewName` parameter. 控件随时仅与一个 相关联，并且始终将该视图命名为 `DefaultView`，尽管此命名限制是由 控件施加的，而不是 的。The control is associated with only one at any time, and always names the view `DefaultView`, although this naming restriction is imposed by the control, not the . 可以重写 方法，以支持具有不同命名约定的视图。You can override the method to support views with a different naming convention. 数据源视图使用 `context` 传递的 对象来访问参数对象，如 和 属性。The object that is passed by `context` is used by the data source view to access parameter objects, such as and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置了 属性，则 属性将返回 `true`。The property returns `true`, if the property is set. 返回计数的方法应返回可以分页的总行数，而不是页面中的行数。The method that returns the count should return the total number of rows that can be paged, not the number of rows in a page. 数据绑定控件使用可以分页的总行数来确定如何呈现分页控件。Data-bound controls use the total number of rows that can be paged to determine how to render paging controls. 例如， 控件页导航中要呈现的数字页导航按钮数。For example, how many numeric pager buttons to render in a control pager. 有关分页支持的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information on paging support, see . 在调用 方法的过程中，将检查 属性，以确保数据源控件支持通过设置各种 属性所请求的所有功能。The property is checked during a call to the method to ensure that the data source control supports all capabilities requested by setting the various properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为当 方法返回 、或 对象时， 控件仅支持对数据进行排序，因此，在调用 方法并返回之前，视图对象无法确定是否支持排序。Because the control only supports sorting data when the method returns a , , or object, the view object cannot determine whether sorting is supported until the method is called and returns. 出于此原因， 属性始终返回 `true`。For this reason, the property always returns `true`.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定在操作期间，当基础数据存储中某行的数据更改时， 控件如何执行更新和删除操作。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines how the control performs updates and deletes when data in a row in the underlying data storage changes during the time of the operation.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认为 值。

span.span: The default is the value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定是否向 `Update` 方法应用旧值和新值的参数。The property determines whether parameters for old and new values are applied to the `Update` method. 例如，如果 属性指定的方法返回一个 对象，其中的列 `Name` 和 `Number`，并且 属性设置为 值，则会为 `Name` 方法的 `Number` 和 `Update` 创建参数。For example, if the method that is specified by the property returns a object with the columns `Name` and `Number`, and the property is set to the value, parameters are created for `Name` and `Number` for the `Update` method. 如果 属性设置为 值，则会创建参数，其名称 `Name`、`Number`、`original_Name`和 `original_Name`。If the property is set to the value, parameters are created with the names `Name`, `Number`, `original_Name`, and `original_Name`. （原始值的参数的准确名称取决于 。）然后 确定 属性中指定的方法是否具有匹配的参数。(The exact name of the parameters for the original values depends on the .) The then determines if the method that is specified in the property has parameters that match. 并发控制是一种技术数据存储，用于控制当多个客户端访问和处理相同数据时，如何在存储中读取和更改数据。Concurrency control is a technique data stores use to control how data is read and changed in the store when multiple clients are accessing and manipulating the same data. 例如，一个客户端读取数据并向用户显示数据，而另一个客户端读取相同的数据，并将其呈现给其他用户。For example, one client reads data and presents it to a user, while another client reads the same data, and presents it to a different user. 如果这两个用户更新数据并将其提交到数据存储，则可能会发生一些意外的结果，因为这两个客户端可能会为同一数据更新不同的值。If both users update the data and submit it to the data storage, some unexpected result might occur, because both clients might update different values for the same data. 这被视为冲突。This is considered a conflict. 通过将 属性设置为 值，`Update` 方法可以根据需要将旧值和新值与原始数据源进行比较，以检测冲突并处理冲突。By setting the property to the value, the `Update` method can then compare the old and new values to the original data source to detect conflicts and handle them, as necessary. 属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of the property is stored in view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为-1，表示已删除未知数量的行。The default value is -1, which means that an unknown number of rows were deleted. 若要返回不同的值，请设置 事件处理程序的 对象的 属性。To return a different value, set the property of the object of the event handler. 受影响的行数通常由业务对象的 `Delete` 方法返回，该值可从 事件处理程序的 参数的 属性中获取。The number of affected rows is typically returned by the `Delete` method for the business object, and that value is available from the property of the parameter of the event handler. 方法将调用 方法，同时传递 `keys` 和 `oldValues` 集合。The method calls the method, passing the `keys` and `oldValues` collections.

summary.span: 操作完成时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a operation has completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理 事件以检查返回值和输出参数的值，或确定 操作完成后是否引发了异常。Handle the event to examine the values of a return value and output parameters or to determine whether an exception was thrown after a operation has completed. 可从与事件关联的 对象中获取返回值、输出参数和异常处理属性。The return value, output parameters, and exception handling properties are available from the object that is associated with the event. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 控件与业务对象和 控件结合使用来删除数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to delete data. 最初显示一组所有雇员，使用由 属性指定的方法从 `EmployeeLogic` 对象中检索数据。The initially displays a set of all employees, using the method that is specified by the property to retrieve the data from the `EmployeeLogic` object. 由于 属性设置为 `true`， 控件会自动显示 "**删除**" 按钮。Because the property is set to `true`, the control automatically displays a **Delete** button. 如果单击 "**删除**" 按钮，则使用 属性指定的方法以及在 集合中指定的任何参数执行 操作。If you click the **Delete** button, the operation is performed using the method that is specified by the property and any parameters that are specified in the collection. 在此代码示例中，还执行了一些预处理和后处理步骤。In this code example, some preprocessing and post-processing steps are also performed. 在执行 操作之前调用 `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` 委托来处理 事件，并调用 `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` 委托来处理 操作完成后的 事件，以执行异常处理。The `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` delegate is called to handle the event before the operation is performed, and the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate is called to handle the event after the operation has completed, to perform an exception handling. 在此示例中，如果引发了 `NorthwindDataException`，则它由此委托处理。In this example, if a `NorthwindDataException` is thrown, it is handled by this delegate. 若要检查此代码示例使用的 `EmployeeLogic` 中间层业务对象的实现，请参阅 。To examine the implementation of the `EmployeeLogic` middle-tier business object that this code example uses, see . remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识的方法可以是实例方法，也可以是 `static` （`Shared` Visual Basic）方法。The method that is identified by the property can be an instance method or a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method. 如果它是实例方法，则每次调用 属性指定的方法时都会创建并销毁业务对象。If it is an instance method, the business object is created and destroyed each time the method specified by the property is called. 在调用 属性指定的方法之前，您可以处理 事件以使用业务对象。You can handle the event to work with the business object before the method specified by the property is called. 你还可以处理在调用 属性指定的方法之后引发的 事件。You can also handle the event that is raised after the method specified by the property is called. 如果该方法是 `static` （`Shared` Visual Basic）方法，则永远不会创建业务对象，也不能处理这些事件。If the method is a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method, the business object is never created and you cannot handle these events. 如果 控件使用的业务对象实现了多个具有相同名称的方法或函数（方法重载），则数据源控件会尝试根据一组条件（包括 集合中的参数）调用正确的一个。If the business object that the control works with implements more than one method or function with the same name (method overloads), the data source control attempts to invoke the correct one according to a set of conditions, including the parameters in the collection. 如果 集合中的参数与 方法签名的参数不匹配，则数据源会引发异常。If the parameters in the collection do not match those of the method signature, the data source throws an exception. 属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of the property is stored in view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 控件与业务对象和 控件结合使用来删除数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to delete data. 最初显示一组所有雇员，使用由 属性指定的方法从 `EmployeeLogic` 对象中检索数据。The initially displays a set of all employees, using the method that is specified by the property to retrieve the data from the `EmployeeLogic` object. 由于 属性设置为 `true`， 控件会自动显示 "**删除**" 按钮。Because the property is set to `true`, the control automatically displays a **Delete** button. 如果单击 "**删除**" 按钮，则使用 属性指定的方法以及在 集合中指定的任何参数执行 操作。If you click the **Delete** button, the operation is performed using the method that is specified by the property and any parameters that are specified in the collection. 在此代码示例中，还执行了一些预处理和后处理步骤。In this code example, some preprocessing and post-processing steps are also performed. 在执行 操作之前调用 `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` 委托来处理 事件，并调用 `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` 委托来处理 操作完成后的 事件，以执行异常处理。The `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` delegate is called to handle the event before the operation is performed, and the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate is called to handle the event after the operation has completed, to perform an exception handling. 在此示例中，如果引发了 `NorthwindDataException`，则它由此委托处理。In this example, if a `NorthwindDataException` is thrown, it is handled by this delegate. 若要检查此代码示例使用的 `EmployeeLogic` 中间层业务对象的实现，请参阅 。To examine the implementation of the `EmployeeLogic` middle-tier business object that this code example uses, see . remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中包含的参数的名称和类型必须匹配 属性签名指定的方法中的参数的名称和类型。The names and types of the parameters that are contained in the collection must match the names and types of the parameters that are in the method specified by the property signature. 参数名称受 属性影响，并区分大小写。The parameter names are affected by the property and are case sensitive. 在使用提供参数的数据绑定控件（如 和 ）时， 控件会自动将集合中显式指定的所有参数与数据绑定控件提供的参数合并。When working with data-bound controls that supply parameters, such as and , the control automatically merges any parameters that are explicitly specified in the collection with those parameters that are provided by the data-bound control. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

span.span: , if the data source control supports paging through the data it retrieves; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过设置 的 ""、""、"" 和 "" 属性，然后在业务对象中使用正确的参数定义 `Select` 方法，可处理由 控件进行分页。Paging by the control is handled by setting the , , , and properties of the and defining a `Select` method in the business object with the proper parameters. 当 属性设置为 `true`时， 集合包括两个附加参数，用于请求的第一行和请求的行数。When the property is set to `true`, the collection includes two additional parameters for the first row requested and the number of rows requested. 这两个参数的命名方式由 和 属性定义。These two parameters are named as defined by the and properties. `Select` 方法应返回从指定索引开始的请求的行数。The `Select` method should return the requested number of rows starting at the specified index. 由于数据可能不会被页面大小平均分割，因此最后一页可能包含较少的行。Because the data might not divide evenly by the page size, the last page might contain fewer rows. 因此，所请求的行数实际上是返回的最大行数。Thus, the number of rows requested is actually the maximum number of rows that are returned. 在调用 方法的过程中，将检查 属性，以确保数据源控件支持通过设置各种 属性所请求的所有功能。The property is checked during a call to the method to ensure that the data source control supports all capabilities requested by setting the various properties. 如果对关联的数据绑定控件启用了分页，则数据绑定控件将调用 `Select` 方法，该方法具有所需的起始索引和行数。When paging is enabled on the associated data-bound control, the data-bound control calls the `Select` method with the start index and number of rows that are required. 此外，如果设置 属性，数据绑定控件将在呈现页导航控件之前调用方法。Additionally, if the property is set, the data-bound control calls the method before rendering the pager controls. 例如，如果某个 控件的页大小为5，并且 方法返回20个，则在页导航中只显示4页。For example, if a control has paging enabled with a page size of 5, and the method returns 20, only 4 pages are displayed in the pager. 属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of the property is stored in view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类实现继承的 方法，以便使用业务对象从基础数据存储区中删除数据。The class implements the inherited method to delete data from an underlying data store using a business object. 页面开发人员和数据绑定控件作者不会直接调用 方法;请改用公开 方法。Page developers and data-bound control authors do not call the method directly; instead, use the publicly exposed method. 在执行删除操作之前，将调用 方法来引发 事件。Before the delete operation is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 你可以处理此事件以检查参数的值，并在调用 方法之前执行任何预处理。You can handle this event to examine the values of the parameters and perform any preprocessing before the method is called. 若要执行删除操作， 使用反射来调用由 属性和 `keys` 和 `oldValues` 集合中的任何关联参数标识的方法，然后执行该操作。To perform a delete operation, the uses reflection to call the method that is identified by the property and any associated parameters in the `keys` and `oldValues` collections, and then executes it. 操作完成后，将调用 方法来引发 事件。After the operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以处理此事件以检查任何返回值和错误代码，并执行任何后续处理。You can handle this event to examine any return values and error codes, and to perform any post-processing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类实现继承的 方法，以便使用业务对象检索数据。The class implements the inherited method to retrieve data using a business object. 页面开发人员和数据绑定控件作者不会直接调用 方法;请改用公开 方法。Page developers and data-bound control authors do not call the method directly; instead, use the publicly exposed method. 指定的方法可以具有任何方法签名，但必须返回下表中列出的 控件的一个类型才能成功调用它。The specified method can have any method signature, but must return one of the types for the control that are listed in the following table to call it successfully. |返回类型Return type|操作Action| |-----------------|------------| || 由 方法返回。The is returned by the method.| ||使用 创建 ，并由 方法返回。A is created using the and returned by the method.| ||提取 的第一个 ，并通过 方法创建并返回 。The first of the is extracted and a is created and returned by the method.| ||对象包装在一个 的单元素中，由 方法返回。The object is wrapped in a one-element and returned by the method.| 在执行数据检索之前，将调用 方法来引发 事件。Before the data retrieval is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 你可以处理此事件以检查参数的值并在操作之前执行任何预处理。You can handle this event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before an operation. 若要执行选择操作， 控件使用反射来调用由 属性标识的方法和 集合中的任何关联参数，然后执行它。To perform a select operation, the control uses reflection to call the method that is identified by the property and any associated parameters that are in the collection, and then executes it. 操作完成后，将调用 方法来引发 事件。After the operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以处理此事件以检查任何返回值和错误代码，并执行任何后续处理。You can handle this event to examine any return values and error codes, and to perform any post-processing. 如果 方法返回一个 对象并启用了缓存，则 在操作过程中从缓存中检索数据并将数据保存到缓存中。If the method returns a object and caching is enabled, the retrieves data from and saves data to the cache during the operation. 缓存是根据 和 属性的组合指定的缓存行为来创建、丢弃或刷新的。The cache is created, discarded, or refreshed based on the caching behavior that is specified by the combination of the and properties. 如果 方法返回一个 对象并指定了 属性，则会与任何提供的 属性一起计算该对象，并在 操作期间将生成的筛选器应用于数据列表。If the method returns a object and a property has been specified, it is evaluated along with any supplied properties and the resulting filter is applied to the list of data during the operation. 有关返回所选行数的信息，请参阅 。For information on returning the number of rows selected, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类实现继承的 方法，以便使用业务对象更新数据。The class implements the inherited method to update data using a business object. 页面开发人员和数据绑定控件作者不会直接调用 方法;请改用公开 方法。Page developers and data-bound control authors do not call the method directly; instead, use the publicly exposed method. 将计算 `keys` 和 `values` 集合中包含的值，并将其与 集合中包含的任何值合并。The values that are contained in the `keys` and `values` collections are evaluated and merged with any values that are contained by the collection. 如果 属性设置为 值，则 `oldValues` 集合中包含的值将设置为 属性的格式，并且还将合并。If the property is set to the value, the values that are contained in the `oldValues` collection are formatted with the property and are also merged. 在执行更新操作之前，将调用 方法来引发 事件。Before the update operation is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 你可以处理此事件以检查参数的值，并在更新之前执行任何预处理。You can handle this event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before an update. 若要执行更新操作， 使用反射来调用由 属性标识的方法和 `keys` 集合中的任何关联参数，然后执行该操作。To perform an update operation, the uses reflection to call the method that is identified by the property and any associated parameters in the `keys` collection, and then executes it. 操作完成后，将调用 方法来引发 事件。After the operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以处理此事件以检查任何返回值、错误代码以及执行任何后续处理。You can handle this event to examine any return values, error codes, and perform any post-processing. 有关返回更新的行数的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information on returning the number of rows updated, see .

summary.span: 获取或设置在调用由 属性标识的业务对象方法时应用的筛选表达式。

span.span: Gets or sets a filtering expression that is applied when the business object method that is identified by the property is called.

value.span: 一个字符串，表示在使用由 属性标识的业务对象方法检索数据时应用的筛选表达式。

span.span: A string that represents a filtering expression applied when data is retrieved using the business object method identified by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当 方法返回 、或 对象时， 控件才支持筛选数据。The control supports filtering data only when the method returns a , , or object. 用于 属性的语法是格式字符串样式表达式。The syntax that is used for the property is a format string-style expression. 筛选表达式语法与 属性接受的语法相同，因为筛选器表达式应用于从执行 方法返回的 对象的 属性。The filter expression syntax is the same syntax that is accepted by the property because the filter expression is applied to the property of the object that is returned from executing the method. （有关详细信息，请参阅 。）如果将参数添加到 集合，则还可以在表达式中包含格式字符串占位符 `"{0}"`，以替换参数值。(For more information, see .) If you add parameters to the collection, you can also include format string placeholders, for example `"{0}"`, in the expression to substitute for parameter values. 占位符根据 集合中参数的索引进行替换。The placeholders are replaced according to the index of the parameter in the collection. 可以在 中包含参数。You can include parameters in the . 如果参数的类型是字符串或字符类型，则将参数括在单引号内。If the type of the parameter is a string or character type, enclose the parameter in single quotation marks. 如果参数是数值类型，则不需要引号。Quotation marks are not needed if the parameter is a numeric type. 集合包含为 中找到的占位符计算的参数。The collection contains the parameters that are evaluated for the placeholders found in the . 属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of the property is stored in view state. > [!IMPORTANT] > 建议验证从客户端接收的任何筛选器参数值。It is recommended that you validate any filter parameter value that you receive from the client. 运行时只需将参数值替换为筛选表达式，并将其应用于 方法返回的 对象。The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the filter expression and applies it to the object that is returned by the method. 如果使用 属性作为安全措施来限制返回的项目数，则必须在进行筛选之前验证参数值。If you are using the property as a security measure to limit the number of items that are returned, you must validate the parameter values before the filtering occurs. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用 控件显示筛选的数据，以便从中间层业务对象中检索数据，并使用 控件来显示结果。The first code example demonstrates how to display filtered data using an control to retrieve data from a middle-tier business object and a control to display the results. 第二个代码示例提供了在第一个代码示例中使用的中间层业务对象的示例。The second code example provides an example of the middle-tier business object that is used in the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件显示筛选的数据，以便从中间层业务对象中检索数据，并使用 控件来显示结果。The following code example demonstrates how to display filtered data using an control to retrieve data from a middle-tier business object and a control to display the results. 仅当检索数据的方法将其检索为 对象时， 控件才能筛选数据。The control can filter data only when the method that retrieves the data retrieves it as a object. 出于此原因， 属性标识将数据作为 检索的业务对象方法。For this reason, the property identifies a business object method that retrieves data as a . 此代码示例由一个 、一个 控件、 控件和一个**提交**按钮组成。The code example consists of a , a control, the control, and a **Submit** button. 默认情况下，将使用其中一个 Northwind 商贸员工的名称填充 。By default, the is populated with the name of one of the Northwind Traders employees. 显示 中的名称所标识的员工的相关信息。The displays information about the employee that is identified by the name in the . 若要检索另一个雇员的数据，请在 "中输入雇员的全名，然后单击"**提交**"按钮。To retrieve data on another employee, in the , enter the full name of the employee, and then click the **Submit** button. 属性指定一个表达式，该表达式用于筛选 属性检索的数据。The property specifies an expression that is used to filter the data that is retrieved by the property. 它使用计算结果为 集合中包含的参数的参数占位符。It uses parameter placeholders that are evaluated to the parameters that are contained in the collection. 在此示例中，参数占位符由单引号界定，因为参数的类型是可能包含空格的字符串类型。In this example, the parameter placeholder is bounded by single quotation marks because the type of the parameter is a string type that might contain spaces. 如果参数的类型是数值或日期类型，则不需要用到边界引号。If the type of the parameter is a numeric or date type, bounding quotation marks are not required. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/CS/objds9cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/VB/objds9vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例提供了前面的代码示例使用的中间层业务对象的示例。The following code example provides an example of a middle-tier business object that the preceding code example uses. 此代码示例包含两个基本类：The code example consists of two basic classes: - `EmployeeLogic` 类，该类封装业务逻辑。The `EmployeeLogic` class, which is a class that encapsulates business logic. - `NorthwindEmployee` 类，该类是一个仅包含从数据层加载和保存数据所需的基本功能的模型类。The `NorthwindEmployee` class, which is a model class that contains only the basic functionality that is required to load and persist data from the data tier. 为简单起见，`EmployeeLogic` 类创建一组静态数据，而不是从数据层检索数据。For simplicity, the `EmployeeLogic` class creates a static set of data, rather than retrieving the data from a data tier. 它在此示例中也很有帮助，因为示例需要提供 Northwind 商贸员工的全名才能演示筛选。It is also helpful for this example, because the sample relies on you to provide the full name of a Northwind Traders employee to demonstrate filtering. 对于完整的工作示例，必须使用所提供的 Web 窗体页代码示例编译并使用这些类。For a complete working example, you must compile and use these classes with the Web Forms page code examples that are provided. remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认返回值为-1，这意味着插入的行数未知。The default return value is -1, which means that an unknown number of rows were inserted. 若要返回不同的值，请设置 事件的 对象的 属性。To return a different value, set the property of the object of the event. 受影响的行数通常由业务对象的 `Insert` 方法返回，该值可从 事件的 对象的 属性中获取。The number of affected rows is typically returned by the `Insert` method for the business object, and that value is available from the property of the object of the event. 方法将调用 方法，同时传递 `values` 集合。The method calls the method, passing the `values` collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理 事件以检查返回值和输出参数的值，或确定 操作完成后是否引发了异常。Handle the event to examine the values of a return value and output parameters or to determine whether an exception was thrown after an operation has completed. 可从与事件关联的 对象中获取返回值、输出参数和异常处理属性。The return value, output parameters, and exception handling properties are available from the object that is associated with the event. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理 事件以执行特定于您的应用程序的其他初始化操作，验证参数的值，或在 控件执行 操作之前更改参数值。Handle the event to perform additional initialization operations that are specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the operation. 参数可用作由 对象公开的 属性访问的 集合。The parameters are available as an collection that is accessed by the property, which is exposed by the object. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何将 控件与业务对象和 控件结合使用以插入数据。The first code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to insert data. 第二个代码示例提供了在第一个代码示例中使用的中间层业务对象的示例。The second code example provides an example of the middle-tier business object that is used in the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何将 控件与业务对象和 控件结合使用以插入数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to insert data. 最初显示新的 `NorthwindEmployee` 记录以及自动生成的 "**插入**" 按钮。The initially displays a new `NorthwindEmployee` record, along with an automatically generated **Insert** button. 在 控件的字段中输入数据后，单击 "**插入**" 按钮。After you enter data into the fields of the control, click the **Insert** button. 属性标识执行 操作的方法。The property identifies which method performs the operation. 在此代码示例中，`UpdateEmployeeInfo` 方法用于执行插入;但是，它需要 `NorthwindEmployee` 参数才能插入数据。In this code example, the `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method is used to perform an insert; however it requires a `NorthwindEmployee` parameter to insert the data. 出于此原因， 控制自动传递的字符串集合是不够的。For this reason, the collection of strings that the control passes automatically is not sufficient. `NorthwindEmployeeInserting` 委托是处理 事件的 对象，它使你能够在执行 操作之前操作输入参数。The `NorthwindEmployeeInserting` delegate is an object that handles the event and enables you to manipulate the input parameters before the operation proceeds. 由于 `UpdateEmployeeInfo` 方法需要将 `NorthwindEmployee` 对象作为参数，因此将使用字符串的集合创建一个参数，然后使用该方法所需的参数名称（`ne`）将其添加到 集合。Because the `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method requires a `NorthwindEmployee` object as a parameter, one is created using the collection of strings, and then added to the collection using a parameter name (`ne`) that the method expects. 使用现有的中间层对象作为数据源时，可以执行如下所述的步骤，这些类型和方法不是专门用于 控件的类型和方法。You might perform steps like these when using an existing middle-tier object as a data source with types and methods that are not designed specifically for use with the control. 执行 操作时，将调用由 属性标识的方法。When the operation is performed, the method that is identified by the property is called. 如果对象的 `Insert` 方法具有包含参数的方法签名，则 集合必须包含名称与方法签名参数相匹配的参数， 方法才能成功完成。If the `Insert` method of the object has a method signature that includes parameters, the collection must contain a parameter with names that match the method signature parameters for the method to complete successfully. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/CS/objds4cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/VB/objds4vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例提供了前面的代码示例使用的中间层业务对象的示例。The following code example provides an example of a middle-tier business object that the preceding code example uses. 此代码示例包含两个基本类：The code example consists of two basic classes: - `EmployeeLogic` 类，该类是一个封装业务逻辑的无状态类。The `EmployeeLogic` class, which is a stateless class that encapsulates business logic. - `NorthwindEmployee` 类，该类是一个仅包含从数据层加载和保存数据所需的基本功能的模型类。The `NorthwindEmployee` class, which is a model class that contains only the basic functionality that is required to load and persist data from the data tier. 提供额外的 `NorthwindDataException` 类是一种方便的方式。An additional `NorthwindDataException` class is provided as a convenience. 若要获取完整的工作示例，必须编译并使用这些类。For a complete working example, you must compile and use these classes. 不完全实现 `UpdateEmployeeInfo` 方法，因此当您试验此示例时，不会将数据插入 Northwind 商贸数据库中。The `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method is not completely implemented, so you will not insert data into the Northwind Traders database when you experiment with this example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识的方法可以是实例方法，也可以是 `static` （`Shared` Visual Basic）方法。The method that is identified by the property can be an instance method or a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method. 如果它是实例方法，则每次调用 属性指定的方法时都会创建并销毁业务对象。If it is an instance method, the business object is created and destroyed each time the method specified by the property is called. 在调用 属性指定的方法之前，您可以处理 事件以使用业务对象。You can handle the event to work with the business object before the method specified by the property is called. 你还可以处理在调用 属性指定的方法之后引发的 事件。You can also handle the event that is raised after the method specified by the property is called. （仅当业务对象实现 接口时，才调用`Dispose`。）如果该方法是 `static` （`Shared` Visual Basic）方法，则永远不会创建业务对象，也不能处理这些事件。(`Dispose` is called, only if the business object implements the interface.) If the method is a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method, the business object is never created and you cannot handle these events. 如果 对象实现多个具有相同名称的方法或函数的业务对象（方法重载），数据源控件会尝试根据一组条件（包括 集合中的参数）调用正确的方法或函数。If the business object that the object implements more than one method or function with the same name (method overloads), the data source control attempts to invoke the correct one according to a set of conditions, including the parameters in the collection. 如果 集合中的参数与 属性签名指定的方法的参数不匹配，则数据源会引发异常。If the parameters in the collection do not match those of the method specified by the property signature, the data source throws an exception. 属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of the property is stored in view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用包含业务对象的 控件和用于插入数据的 控件显示筛选的数据。The first code example demonstrates how to display filtered data using an control with a business object and a control to insert data. 第二个代码示例提供了在第一个代码示例中使用的中间层业务对象的示例。The second code example provides an example of the middle-tier business object that is used in the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何将 控件与业务对象和 控件结合使用以插入数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to insert data. 最初显示新的 `NorthwindEmployee` 记录以及自动生成的 "**插入**" 按钮。The initially displays a new `NorthwindEmployee` record, along with an automatically generated **Insert** button. 在 控件的字段中输入数据后，单击 "**插入**" 按钮。After you enter data into the fields of the control, click the **Insert** button. 属性标识执行 操作的方法。The property identifies which method performs the operation. 在此代码示例中，`UpdateEmployeeInfo` 方法用于执行插入;但是，它需要 `NorthwindEmployee` 参数才能插入数据。In this code example, the `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method is used to perform an insert; however, it requires a `NorthwindEmployee` parameter to insert the data. 出于此原因， 控制自动传递的字符串集合是不够的。For this reason, the collection of strings that the control passes automatically is not sufficient. `NorthwindEmployeeInserting` 委托是处理 事件的 对象，它使你能够在执行 操作之前操作输入参数。The `NorthwindEmployeeInserting` delegate is an object that handles the event and enables you to manipulate the input parameters before the operation proceeds. 由于 `UpdateEmployeeInfo` 方法需要将 `NorthwindEmployee` 对象作为参数，因此将使用字符串的集合创建一个参数，并使用该方法所需的参数名称（`ne`）将其添加到 集合。Because the `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method requires a `NorthwindEmployee` object as a parameter, one is created using the collection of strings and is added to the collection using a parameter name (`ne`) that the method expects. 使用现有的中间层对象作为数据源时，可以执行如下所述的步骤，这些类型和方法不是专门用于 控件的类型和方法。You might perform steps like these when using an existing middle-tier object as a data source with types and methods that are not designed specifically for use with the control. 执行 操作时，将调用由 属性标识的方法。When the operation is performed, the method that is identified by the property is called. 如果对象的 `Insert` 方法具有包含参数的方法签名，则 集合必须包含名称与方法签名参数相匹配的参数， 方法才能成功完成。If the `Insert` method of the object has a method signature that includes parameters, the collection must contain a parameter with names that match the method signature parameters for the method to complete successfully. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/CS/objds4cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_4/VB/objds4vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例提供了前面的代码示例使用的中间层业务对象的示例。The following code example provides an example of a middle-tier business object that the previous code example uses. 此代码示例包含两个基本类和一个附加类：The code example consists of two basic classes and an additional class: - `EmployeeLogic` 类是无状态类，它封装业务逻辑。The `EmployeeLogic` class is a stateless class, which encapsulates business logic. - `NorthwindEmployee` 类是一个模型类，该类仅包含从数据层加载和保存数据所需的基本功能。The `NorthwindEmployee` class is a model class, which contains only the basic functionality that is required to load and persist data from the data tier. - 提供额外的 `NorthwindDataException` 类是一种方便的方式。An additional `NorthwindDataException` class is provided as a convenience. 若要获取完整的工作示例，必须编译并使用这些类。For a complete working example, you must compile and use these classes. 不完全实现 `UpdateEmployeeInfo` 方法，因此当你尝试此代码示例时，你将不会在 Northwind 商贸数据库中插入数据。The `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method is not completely implemented, so you will not insert data into the Northwind Traders database when you experiment with this code example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中包含的参数的名称和类型必须匹配 属性签名指定的方法中的参数的名称和类型。The names and types of the parameters that are contained in the collection must match the names and types of the parameters that are in the method specified by the property signature. 在使用提供参数的数据绑定控件（如 和 ）时， 控件会自动将集合中显式指定的所有参数与数据绑定控件提供的参数合并。When working with data-bound controls that supply parameters, such as and , the control automatically merges any parameters that are explicitly specified in the collection with those parameters that are provided by the data-bound control. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . ## "**插入**" 按钮。The initially displays a new `NorthwindEmployee` record, along with an automatically generated **Insert** button. 在 控件的字段中输入数据后，单击 "**插入**" 按钮。After you enter data into the fields of the operation is performed using the method that is specified by the property and any parameters that are specified in the collection. 在此代码示例中，在与监察员 ID 相对应的 集合中指定一个参数。In this code example, one parameter is specified in the collection that corresponds to the supervisor's ID. 这是因为，即使 ID 作为 对象显示在 控件的 集合中，它也将作为字符串传递到 控件。This is because even though the ID is displayed in the collection for the control as a object, it will be passed as a string to the control. 通过将其显式添加到 集合，并将其 属性设置为 值， 将其作为 `int`而不是 `string`传递给方法。By adding it explicitly to the collection with a property that is set to the value, it will be passed correctly by the to the method as an `int`, not as `string`. 执行 操作时，将调用由 属性标识的方法。When the operation is performed, the method that is identified by the property is called. 如果对象的 `Insert` remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由 .NET Framework 基础结构使用，不应在代码中直接使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不过，控件开发人员可以重写此方法，以指定自定义服务器控件如何还原其视图状态。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100)). 方法从 方法保存的上一个页请求还原 对象的视图状态信息。The method restores view-state information for the object from a previous page request that was saved by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件将自动调用业务对象的无参数构造函数，以使用反射来创建和实例。The control automatically calls the parameterless constructor of a business object to create and instance of it using reflection. 处理 事件以显式调用另一个构造函数，并将生成的对象实例设置为关联 对象的 属性。Handle the event to explicitly call another constructor and to set the instance of the object that results to the property of the associated object. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 如果标识用于执行数据操作的方法是 `static` （`Shared` 在 Visual Basic 中），则永远不会引发 和 事件。If the method that is identified to perform the data operation is `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic), the and events are never raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 格式字符串仅应用于主键，如使用数据绑定控件的 `DataKeyNames` 属性标识的参数，或在删除和更新方案中标识的，其中 属性设置为 值以及传递给相应数据方法的原始值集。The format string is applied to primary keys only, such as those that are identified with the `DataKeyNames` property of a data-bound control or in delete and update scenarios, where the property is set to the value and the set of original values that are passed to the corresponding data method. 可以更改 属性的两个常见情况如下所示：Two common scenarios where you might change the property are as follows: - 区分更新中的旧值和新值。To differentiate between old and new values in updates. 属性设置为 值时，会将原始值和新值的参数添加到 集合。When the property is set to the value, parameters for both the original and new values are added to the collection. 如果没有格式字符串，则将为每个数据字段创建两个具有相同名称的参数。Without the formatting string, two parameters with the same name would be created for each data field. 通过更改原始值参数的名称，可以将数据与原始数据源进行比较，以检测冲突并比较键值。By changing the name of the original value parameter, you can compare the data to the original data source to detect conflicts and compare key values. - 某些可视化设计器为原始值和键实现了特定的命名方案。Some visual designers implement a particular naming scheme for original values and keys. 的值存储在视图状态中。The value of the is stored in view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 控件与业务对象和 控件结合使用来删除数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to delete data. 最初显示一组所有雇员，使用由 属性指定的方法从 `EmployeeLogic` 对象中检索数据。The initially displays a set of all employees, using the method that is specified by the property to retrieve the data from the `EmployeeLogic` object. 由于 属性设置为 `true`， 控件会自动显示 "**删除**" 按钮。Because the property is set to `true`, the control automatically displays a **Delete** button. 如果单击 "**删除**" 按钮，则使用 属性指定的方法以及在 集合中指定的任何参数执行 操作。If you click the **Delete** button, the operation is performed using the method that is specified by the property and any parameters that are specified in the collection. 在此代码示例中，还执行了一些预处理和后处理步骤。In this code example, some preprocessing and post-processing steps are also performed. 在执行 操作之前调用 `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` 委托来处理 事件，并调用 `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` 委托来处理 操作完成后的 事件，以执行异常处理。The `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` delegate is called to handle the event before the operation is performed, and the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate is called to handle the event after the operation has completed, to perform an exception handling. 在此示例中，如果引发了 `NorthwindDataException`，则它由此委托处理。In this example, if a `NorthwindDataException` is thrown, it is handled by this delegate. 若要检查此代码示例使用的 `EmployeeLogic` 中间层业务对象的实现，请参阅 。To examine the implementation of the `EmployeeLogic` middle-tier business object that this code example uses, see . summary.span: 保存自页回发到服务器后， 对象的视图状态更改。

span.span: Saves the changes to the view state for the object since the time when the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 包含 视图状态更改的对象；否则，如果没有与对象关联的视图状态，则为 。

span.span: The object that contains the changes to the view state; otherwise , if there is no view state associated with the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控件开发人员使用。The method is primarily used by control developers. 视图状态是服务器控件属性的值的累计。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 这些值自动放置在服务器控件的 属性中，该属性是 类的实例。These values are automatically placed in the property for the server control, which is an instance of the class. 然后，在服务器控件生命周期的保存状态阶段之后将 值保留到字符串对象。The value is then persisted to a string object after the save-state stage of the server control life cycle. 保存视图状态后，视图状态内容将作为存储在 HTML `Hidden` 元素中的变量返回给客户端。When view state is saved, view state contents are returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an HTML `Hidden` element. 创作自定义服务器控件时，可以通过重写 方法并修改服务器控件的 `ViewState` 属性来提高效率。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding the method and modifying the `ViewState` property for your server control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理 事件以检查返回值和输出参数的值，或确定在数据检索操作完成后是否引发了异常。Handle the event to examine the values of a return value and output parameters or to determine whether an exception was thrown after a data retrieval operation has completed. 可从与事件关联的 对象中获取返回值、输出参数和异常处理属性。The return value, output parameters, and exception handling properties are available from the object that is associated with the event. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/).

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件调用以检索数据的方法或函数的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the method or function that the control invokes to retrieve data.

value.span: 一个字符串，表示 用于检索数据的方法或函数的名称。

span.span: A string that represents the name of the method or function that the uses to retrieve data.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的方法可以具有任何方法签名，但必须返回下表中列出的类型之一，以便 控件成功调用它The specified method can have any method signature but must return one of the types listed in the following table in order for the control to call it successfully |返回类型Return type|操作Action| |-----------------|------------| || 由 方法返回。The is returned by the method.| ||使用 创建 ，并由 方法返回。A is created using the and returned by the method.| ||提取 的第一个 ，并通过 方法创建并返回 。The first of the is extracted and a is created and returned by the method.| ||对象包装在一个 的单元素中，由 方法返回。The object is wrapped in a one-element and returned by the method.| 属性标识的方法可以是实例方法，也可以是 `static` （`Shared` Visual Basic）方法。The method that is identified by the property can be an instance method or a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method. 如果它是实例方法，则每次调用 方法时都会创建并销毁业务对象。If it is an instance method, the business object is created and destroyed each time the method is called. 在调用 属性指定的方法之前，您可以处理 事件以使用业务对象。You can handle the event to work with the business object before the method specified by the property is called. 你还可以处理在调用 属性指定的方法之后引发的 事件。You can also handle the event that is raised after the method specified by the property is called. （仅当业务对象实现 接口时，才调用`Dispose`。）如果该方法是 `static` （`Shared` Visual Basic）方法，则永远不会创建业务对象，也不能处理这些事件。(`Dispose` is called only if the business object implements the interface.) If the method is a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method, the business object is never created and you cannot handle these events. 如果 控件使用的业务对象实现了多个具有相同名称的方法或函数（方法重载），则数据源控件会尝试根据一组条件（包括 集合中的参数）调用正确的一个。If the business object that the control works with implements more than one method or function with the same name (method overloads), the data source control attempts to invoke the correct one according to a set of conditions, including the parameters in the collection. 如果 集合中的参数与 属性指定的方法的签名不匹配，则数据源会引发异常。If the parameters in the collection do not match those of the signature of the method specified by the property, the data source throws an exception. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 控件如何使用 控件在 Web 窗体页上显示数据。The following code example demonstrates how a control can display data using an control on a Web Forms page. 标识部分或完全限定类名及其 属性，并使用调用的方法来检索带有 属性的数据。The identifies a partially or fully qualified class name with its property and a method that is called to retrieve data with its property. 在运行时，将创建对象并使用反射调用方法。At run time, the object is created and the method is called using reflection. 控件枚举 返回的 集合，然后显示数据。The control enumerates through the collection that is returned by the , and then displays the data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1/CS/objds1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1/VB/objds1vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中包含的参数的名称和类型必须匹配 属性签名指定的方法中的参数的名称和类型。The names and types of the parameters that are contained in the collection must match the names and types of the parameters that are in the method specified by the property signature. 在使用提供参数的数据绑定控件（如 和 ）时， 控件会自动将集合中显式指定的所有参数与数据绑定控件提供的参数合并。When working with data-bound controls that supply parameters, such as and , the control automatically merges any parameters that are explicitly specified in the collection with those parameters that are provided by the data-bound control. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件检索单个数据记录，然后在 控件中显示数据记录。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve a single data record using an control, and then display the data record in a control. 通过调用 `EmployeeLogic` 类的 `GetEmployee` 方法来检索特定雇员记录。The retrieves a specific employee record by calling the `GetEmployee` method of the `EmployeeLogic` class. `GetEmployee` 方法需要 employee ID 参数。The `GetEmployee` method requires an employee ID parameter. 控件使用其 集合中的 对象将 ID 传递到 `GetEmployee` 方法。The control uses a object in its collection to pass an ID to the `GetEmployee` method. 若要查看 `EmployeeLogic` 类和 `GetEmployee` 方法的示例实现，请参阅 。To view the example implementation of the `EmployeeLogic` class and the `GetEmployee` method, see . remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要创建 控件绑定到的对象的实例，控件将使用反射来加载运行时由类型名称标识的类型。To create an instance of the object that the control binds to, the control uses reflection to load the type that is identified by the type name at run time. 因此， 属性的值可以是位于 Bin 或 App_Code 目录中的代码的部分限定类型，也可以是在全局程序集缓存中注册的代码的完全限定类型名称。Therefore, the value of the property can be a partially qualified type for code that is located in the Bin or App_Code directory or a fully qualified type name for code that is registered in the global assembly cache. 如果使用全局程序集缓存，则必须将相应的引用添加到 Machine.config 或 web.config 配置文件的 `assemblies` 部分。If you use the global assembly cache, you must add the appropriate reference to the `assemblies` section of the Machine.config or Web.config configuration file. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 控件如何使用 控件在 Web 窗体页上显示数据。The following code example demonstrates how a control can display data using an control on a Web Forms page. 标识部分或完全限定类名及其 属性，并使用调用的方法来检索带有 属性的数据。The identifies a partially or fully qualified class name with its property and a method that is called to retrieve data with its property. 在运行时，将创建对象并使用反射调用方法。At run time, the object is created and the method is called using reflection. 控件枚举 返回的 集合，并显示数据。The control enumerates through the collection that is returned by the and displays the data. remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认返回值为-1，这表示更新了未知的行数。The default return value is -1, which means that an unknown number of rows were updated. 若要返回不同的值，请设置 事件的 对象的 属性。To return a different value, set the property of the object of the event. 受影响的行数通常由业务对象的 `Update` 方法返回，该值可从 事件的 参数的 属性中获取。The number of affected rows is typically returned by the `Update` method for the business object, and that value is available from the property of the parameter of the event. 方法将调用 方法，同时传递 `keys`、`values`和 `oldValues` 参数。The method calls the method, passing the `keys`, `values`, and `oldValues` parameters.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Updated As ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler

summary.span: 在 操作完成时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an operation has completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理 事件以检查返回值和输出参数的值，或确定 操作完成后是否引发了异常。Handle the event to examine the values of a return value and output parameters or to determine whether an exception was thrown after an operation has completed. 可从与事件关联的 对象中获取返回值、输出参数和异常处理属性。The return value, output parameters, and exception handling properties are available from the object that is associated with the event. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/).

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象调用以更新数据的方法或函数的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the method or function that the object invokes to update data.

value.span: 表示 用于更新数据的方法或函数的名称的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents the name of the method or function that the uses to update data.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象假定 属性标识的方法每次执行一个更新，而不是在批处理中执行更新。The object assumes that the method that is identified by the property performs updates one at a time, rather than in a batch. 方法可以是实例方法，也可以是 `static` （`Shared` Visual Basic）方法。The method can be an instance method or a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method. 如果它是实例方法，则每次调用 属性指定的方法时都会创建并销毁业务对象。If it is an instance method, the business object is created and destroyed each time the method specified by the property is called. 在调用 属性指定的方法之前，您可以处理 事件以使用业务对象。You can handle the event to work with the business object before the method specified by the property is called. 你还可以处理在调用 方法之后引发的 事件。You can also handle the event that is raised after the method is called. （仅当业务对象实现 接口时，才调用`Dispose`。）如果该方法是 `static` （`Shared` Visual Basic）方法，则永远不会创建业务对象，也不能处理这些事件。(`Dispose` is called, only if the business object implements the interface.) If the method is a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method, the business object is never created and you cannot handle these events. 如果 对象所使用的业务对象实现了多个具有相同名称的方法或函数（方法重载），则数据源控件会尝试根据一组条件（包括 集合中的参数）调用正确的一个。If the business object that the object works with implements more than one method or function with the same name (method overloads), the data source control attempts to invoke the correct one according to a set of conditions, including the parameters in the collection. 如果 集合中的参数与 属性指定的方法的签名不匹配，则数据源会引发异常。If the parameters in the collection do not match those of the signature of the method specified by the property, the data source throws an exception. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . 属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of the property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件、 控件和几个 控件来更新数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control, controls, and several controls to update data. 显示 `NorthwindEmployee`的名称，而 控件用于输入和更新地址信息。The displays the name of a `NorthwindEmployee`, while the controls are used to enter and update address information. 由于 集合包含绑定到 的选定值的 对象，因此仅在选择了员工之后才会启用触发 操作的按钮。Because the collection contains a object that is bound to the selected value of the , the button that triggers the operation is enabled only after an employee is selected. remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中包含的参数的名称和类型必须匹配 属性签名指定的方法中的参数的名称和类型。The names and types of the parameters that are contained in the collection must match the names and types of the parameters that are in the method specified by the property signature. 参数名称受 属性影响，并区分大小写。The parameter names are affected by the property and are case sensitive. 在使用提供参数的数据绑定控件（如 和 ）时， 控件会自动将集合中显式指定的所有参数与数据绑定控件提供的参数合并。When working with data-bound controls that supply parameters, such as and , the control automatically merges any parameters that are explicitly specified in the collection with those parameters that are provided by the data-bound control. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件、 控件和几个 控件来更新数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control, controls, and several controls to update data. 显示 `NorthwindEmployee`的名称，而 控件用于输入和更新地址信息。The displays the name of a `NorthwindEmployee`, while the controls are used to enter and update address information. 由于 集合包含绑定到 的选定值的 对象，因此仅在选择了员工之后才会启用触发 操作的按钮。Because the collection contains a object that is bound to the selected value of the , the button that triggers the operation is enabled only after an employee is selected. remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理 事件以执行特定于您的应用程序的其他初始化操作，验证参数的值，或在 控件执行 操作之前更改参数值。Handle the event to perform additional initialization operations that are specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the operation. 参数可用作 集合，由 对象公开的 属性访问。The parameters are available as an collection, accessed by the property, which is exposed by the object. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件、 控件和几个 控件来更新数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control, controls, and several controls to update data. 显示 `NorthwindEmployee`的名称，而 控件用于输入和更新地址信息。The displays the name of a `NorthwindEmployee`, while the controls are used to enter and update address information. 由于 集合包含绑定到 的选定值的 对象，因此仅在选择了员工之后才会启用触发 操作的按钮。Because the collection contains a object that is bound to the selected value of the , the button that triggers the operation is enabled only after an employee is selected.
